page1.title: GAME RULES
page1.tf0:
All symbols pay in blocks of minimum 5 symbols connected 
horizontally or vertically. The game is played on a 7x7
 grid of symbols.
page1.item2:
This is the SCATTER symbol.
SCATTER symbol appears on all reels.

page2.title: TUMBLE FEATURE
page2.tf0:
The TUMBLE FEATURE means that after every spin, winning
 combinations are paid and all winning symbols disappear.
 The remaining symbols fall to the bottom of the screen
 and the empty positions are replaced with symbols
coming from above.
page2.tf1:
Tumbling will continue until no more winning combinations
 appear as a result of a tumble. There's no limit to the
number of possible tumbles.
page2.tf2:
All wins are added to the player's balance after all of the
 tumbles resulted from a base spin have been played.
page2.tf3:
Whenever a winning symbol explodes it marks its spot on 
the grid. After the second time a symbol explodes on
the same spot a multiplier is added to the spot, starting 
from: 1x2 and doubling every time one more symbol
explodes on top of it up to a maximum of x128.
 The multiplier applies to all winning combinations that
 hit on top of it. If more multipliers are involved in the 
same winning combination, they add to each other.
page2.tf4:
In the base game all the marked spots with multipliers
 last until the end of the tumbling sequence, being cleared
when there are no more tumbles.
page2.tf5:
Hit 3, 4, 5, 6, or 7 SCATTER symbols anywhere on the screen
 to win 10, 12, 15, 20, or 30 free spins, respectively.
During the FREE SPINS round marked spots and their
 multipliers remain in place until the end of the round and can
increase with subsequent tumbles across all of the free spins.
page2.tf6:
Hit 3, 4, 5, 6, or 7 SCATTER symbols during the round
 anywhere on the screen to win 10, 12, 15, 20, or 30
 additional free spins respectively.
page2.tf7: Special reels are in play during the feature.

page3.title: MAX WIN
page3.tf0:
The maximum win amount is limited to 5,000x bet in both
 base game and free spin. If the total win of a FREE SPINS
 ROUND reaches 5,000x bet the round immediately ends,
 win is awarded and all remaining free spins are forfeited.
page3.tf1:
The FREE SPINS ROUND can be instantly triggered from
 the base game by buying it for 100x current total bet.
When buying the FREE SPINS round, you can hit 3, 4, 5,
 6 or 7 SCATTER symbols randomly.

page4.title: GAME RULES
page4.tf0:
High volatility games may pay less than average but
 in a short time. There is a high probability of multiple
 big wins in the range.
page4.tf1:
Symbols pay everywhere.
All winnings are multiplied by the base bet.
page4.tf2:
All values ​​are expressed based on actual coin earnings.
When winning with multiple symbols, all wins are added
 to the total win.
page4.tf3: Free spins are given to the player after the round is completed.
page4.tf4:
The total winnings of Freespins in the past include
 the total winnings of the series.
page4.tf5: The theoretical RTP of this game is 96.62%.
page4.tf7: Malfunction voids all pays and plays.

page5.title: HOW TO PLAY

textCombined1.part2:
buttons to change the bet value
and open the bet menu.

page5.tf1: Select the bet you want to use in the game.

textCombined2.part1:
Opens the SETTINGS menu contains settings
which affect the way the game is being played.

page5.tf4:
The BALANCE and TOTAL BET labels display
the current balance and the total bet.

textCombined4.part2: You can use the buttons to increase

page6.title: SETTINGS MENU
page6.tf0:
INTRO SCREEN - toggles the introductory screen
on and off
AMBIENCE - toggles the ambient sound and music in
the game on and off
SOUND EFFECTS - Turns the game's sound effects
on and off
GAME HISTORY - Opens the game history page

bonusSpins.tfBonusMessage:
You can use your bonus spins now or choose to use them
later until expiry.
